channel.title: Passwords?!?
channel.description:
ok on my source that i have i want to be able to check out what people have on their accs cuz my logs say they have duped items but i cant see the password..... it looks like this--- This account might contain duped items character-password = 159-157-81-188-112-239-33-202-92-20-243-7-152-10-41-216
how would i change character-password = bob?? please help

item.title: Passwords?!?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

[quote=“Nets8, post:16, topic:171091”]To prevent party hat duping (don’t forget it pretty much disables crackers), first search for itemUseID == 962 in client.java. Once you are there, delete the whole following code:

if(itemUseID == 962) { int prize = Item.randomPartyHat(); int get = getprizes(); sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1); p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you."); if (get == 1) { sendMessage("You get the prize!"); p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize."); } else { sendMessage("They get the prize."); p2.addItem(prize, 1); p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!"); } }
What this does is delete the effect, but you haven’t deleted the source so if you want you can make the effect again.[/quote]
Do you even know how they dupe?..and he didnt ask for anti-dupe anyway…
ty delta i needed that

Read full topic

item.title: Passwords?!?
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

To prevent party hat duping (don’t forget it pretty much disables crackers), first search for itemUseID == 962 in client.java. Once you are there, delete the whole following code:

if(itemUseID == 962) { int prize = Item.randomPartyHat(); int get = getprizes(); sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1); p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you."); if (get == 1) { sendMessage("You get the prize!"); p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize."); } else { sendMessage("They get the prize."); p2.addItem(prize, 1); p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!"); } }
What this does is delete the effect, but you haven’t deleted the source so if you want you can make the effect again.

Read full topic

item.title: Passwords?!?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

delta:

He’s not going to go through like 5000 char files lol

Easy to search for duped items, I did it through 12k Char files…

All you gotta do is go into your Char folder, and search for the item id, and check all the files that come up with it, and if they have massive amounts of items, I ip them, & Delete that item.
